articles.title: Asteroid explodes over English Channel after rare early detection - The Telegraph
articles.description: The collision was one of the only times in history that an asteroid impact has been predicted in advance
articles.content:
An asteroid has exploded above the English Channel after entering the Earths atmosphere.
The 1m (3ft) meteoroid - or small asteroid - was seen shortly before 03:00 GMT on Monday morning.

articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 13 February 2023: Green Comet ZTF flies past Mars - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA’s Astronomy Picture of the Day is a picturesque image of Comet ZTF as it passed by Mars on its 50000-year journey.

articles.title: Elon Musk's SpaceX fires 55 Starlink satellites into orbit on Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral - Daily Mail
articles.description: SpaceX has conducted its 10th launch of the year sending 55 Starlink satellites into space with its Falcon 9 rocket. SpaceX has received permission to deploy up to 12,000 satellites.
articles.content:
